DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , prospective , randomized comparative study patient randomize one four different bladder volume Cough Stress Test ( CST ) perform stand sit position . The goal ass agreement CST method urodynamics diagnosis Stress Urinary Incontinence ( SUI ) 24-hour pad test . The primary outcome determine CST method best correlate either test diagnosis SUI .
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , prospective randomize study approve Institutional Review Boards University Hospitals Case Medical Center , Cleveland , OH , USA MetroHealth Hospital , Cleveland , OH , USA ( Identifiers 07-11-37 FWA00003938 , respectively ) . Adult woman present Female Pelvic Medicine Reconstructive Surgery ( FPMRS ) outpatient clinic University Hospitals Case Medical Center MetroHealth Hospital symptom stress , urge , mixed urinary incontinence recommend evaluating staff undergo urodynamic study ( UDS ) eligible . The staff physician approach patient participation study standard clinic visit complete initial diagnosis make . A research coordinator explain study obtain informed consent patient agree participate . The patient give instruction 24 hour pad test standardize pad use . The patient also give instruction three day void diary along routine instruction regard urodynamic procedure . The patient ask perform 24 hour pad test day prior UDS appointment . The three day void diary perform typical sequential three day period week prior UDS . Patients ask bring item UDS appointment . During initial appointment study coordinator , patient randomize 4 group ( A , B , C , D ) . Patients group A schedule undergo Cough Stress Test ( CST ) comfortably full bladder . This subjectively report patient . Patients group B schedule undergo CST empty bladder straight catheterization . Group C patient schedule undergo CST bladder infuse 200 cc saline . Patients group D schedule undergo CST bladder fill half functional capacity determine large voided volume record patient 's voiding diary . CST perform stand sit position patient group . The sequence perform stand sit CST randomly assign patient .
DOC.criteria: symptom urinary incontinence chief complaint reason schedule clinic visit , schedule undergo urodynamic ( UDS ) test initial evaluation physician pelvic organ prolapse beyond stage 1 Pelvic Organ Prolapse Quantification ( POPQ ) diagnose examine physician clinical diagnosis urinary incontinence undergo UDS testing ( e.g . interstitial cystitis , overactive bladder dry , bladder outlet obstruction ) take alpha agonist anticholinergic medication within 2 week test elevate Post Void Residual ( PVR ) > 50cc physical mental disability would either allow participation impede ability give fully inform consent pregnancy
